level.heading: Uniformity of interpretation.
level.text: This subchapter shall be interpreted and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law of jurisdictions that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-173, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 15-351.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 7 of the Uniform Enforcement of Foreign Judgments Act (1964). See 13 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
